title: sell players
body:
Hello Riot Games 

just to say i want sell my players its twitch singed and teemo and Rammus sell them 


Thank you

replies.body: Hey there, you should be able to refund purchased champs through the [refund token system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If you're out of tokens, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can make any exceptions.  I can't guarantee anything, though, but we'll check it out.
